column3: verse kick a hypest lyric every time i run up on a track you know i'm not wack you have to step back 'cause if you don't i'll prove that i'm the mac every time i kick a lyric tune it to twoninetyfive yo' do you find me live if you don't then that's all right 'cause i'll just grab the microphone and i just got to get so hype when i speak in a hyper tone there's so many styles i might get thrown and here's a place where i like to roam and all the girls that i like to bone have the big butts no they don't 'cause i don't like that nigga shit i'm just here to make a bigger hit when i be kickin' the hypest dopest rhymes just say that eminem is the best mc in of all times yeah
